name: Goody Drop
description:
You are the pilot of an airplane and your cargo is a crate full of goodies. You need to drop the goodies on a moving landing platform.

As you progress in your mission, the difficulty will increase and your skills will be put to the test!

Goody Drop includes:

>> 3 play modes (Goody Drop, Time Challenge, Survival)

>> 5 planes to unlock

>> 21 levels of increasing difficulty (Smaller Landing Zone, Faster plane, Higher Flying Altitude...)

>> 3 Leaderboards so you can compete against the Best Players in the World and your Friends

>> 20 Achievements in the Game Center so you can challenge your Friends
